ModEntry.Name: Cypr Explorer
ModEntry.Author: TinManTex
ModEntry.Description:
Requires Infinite Heaven Lets you explore cypr by adding a mission and a menu with an option to load each 'step'/section of the map (while in the mission).
Note: Use <Activate> misc_loadCyprStep after chosing the numbered step. The 1st 9 steps are inside the hospital, 10 is the first section outside (where the player spawns).
